overview: Irrepressible porn eccentric Joey Silvera extends an invitation to a special gathering, and he's got some beautiful asses for you to meet. The quirky vignettes in his two-disc extravaganza "The Ass Party 2" feature seven of the most adorable rumps in adult entertainment, and these chicks all get totally reamed for the sake of a good time. Joey's free form style of gonzo porn means anything can happen - as long as it's perverse!
title: The Ass Party 2
